name: Sootly
description:
No ads. No subscriptions. No daily limits or pay-to-play. Just a devilishly difficult word game—as much of it as you can handle.

Sootly is the hit word deduction game that will make you see the English language in a new light. Play the daily puzzle (it'll be over 6 years before you see a repeat word) or try to get every achievement in Random Mode.

The clues are ambiguous, so you'll have to put two and two together for the solve. This is no lightweight! Buckle in and get ready for a tough time.

Made and maintained by a solo dev in Utah, USA.
